data.expected_result: It should jump again to the pinned message.
data.short_description: Jump to message doesn't work twice for the same message
data.steps_to_repro: - Open pinned messages for example - Click "Jump" for any pinned message - Scroll a bit in message history to make sure the pinned message is out of sight - Open pinned messages again - Click again "Jump" for the same pinned message
